article.text: Come check out SIGNAL Connections' new Homefront Help page on Facebook! People and organizations can use the page as a forum to post messages of thanks and encouragement to the troops, tout organizations and programs that assist the military community and connect with other troop supporters. SIGNAL staff will update the page with information about help, discounts, freebies and more available to service members, veterans and their families and about ways the public can reach out to show their appreciation. You can become a part of the action by clicking the "like" button on the page. And don't forget to invite your Facebook friends.
